repository.corpname: Marist College Archives and Special Collections

did.abstract: The Annia F. Booth Papers contains the journal of Annia Booth, which details her life starting in January 1904 through 1905.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The Annia F. Booth Papers consists of the journal of Annia Booth written in the years 1904 through 1905.

acqinfo.p: The Annia F. Booth Papers was donated to Marist Library by Michael O’Shea.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Annia Booth was 21 years old in 1904 and living in New York City. She had left home in July 1903. This journal starts about six months later in January 1904.

arrangement.p: This collection has one series containing Annia F. Booth's Journal.
